name: Vencimientos - SAI
description: A WPF program developed using C#, this was developed in order to convert and format an Excel file exported from SAI (a software to register invoices).

name: Flappy Bird Game Clone
description: A FlappyBird clone game made with Unity, implementing a score and physics just like the original game.

name: Quote it!
description: Quotes application using Kotlin that allows to share your own Quotes to show them to your followers.

name: Device Control System
description: A device control system for an enterprise, that shows the whole computers and electronical devices, and who is the person using them, the condition of the device and past owners.

name: AI Player Space Invaders
description: An AI developed using Python and TensorFlow to make it learn how to play Space Invaders, trying to get the highest score.
